home.description:
MapStore 2 is developed to create, save and share in a simple and intuitive way maps and mashup created selecting contents by server like Google Maps, OpenStreetMap, MapQuest or specific servers provided by your organization or third party.
Visit the home page for more details.

Homepage.appDescription:
Access the environmental and territorial data of Piedmont .
Environmental data are collected and integrated in the Piedmont SIRA (Regional Environmental Information System), in cooperation between producers of environmental information (Region, Provinces and ARPA).
The service was created for government and protection of the territory , participatory planning , awareness and involvement of citizens .
Homepage.titolo: Environmental and territorial data from Piedmont
Homepage.descrizione: A platform for the use of alphanumeric and geographical knowledge produced in the context of SIRA Piemonte
Homepage.sezioneMappa:
The map

Consult the map incorporated within the platform to georeference and analyze the data made available.

You will be able to view the data grouped by categories or thematic views which aggregate datasets within them for clear consultation and greater visibility. easy comparison.

Footer.service2: A service provided by Regione Piemonte

Dataset.description: Search for objects and thematic views

SistemaConoscenzeAmbientaliBox.text:
Presentation

Sistema Conoscenze Ambientali is a platform for use of alphanumeric and geographical knowledge produced in the context of SIRA Piemonte (Environmental Information System of the Piedmont Region). It is configured as a cooperation network between producers and / or holders of informations of environmental interest (Region, Provinces and ARPA) and was created with the aim of supporting the development of environmental knowledge for the activities of: government and participatory planning; promotion of the competitiveness of the territory; awareness and involvement (empowerment); accessibility to public information.

The system is aimed at different public and private users:

  • Public Administration (Region, Provinces, ARPA, ...)
  • Citizens

Data made available in the system are collected through multiple processes: Dematerialization of administrative procedures; Ambient status / pressure monitoring systems (manual or automatic); Data collection on specific matrices (eg. Waste Observatories / Waters ...), pressure / risk factors, ...
The system allows access to data consultation through free search and / or through an access organized into thematic categories ( data catalogs such as INSPIRE Directive Catalog and Environmental Information Catalog; environmental thematic categories - Air, Remediation, Authorized companies in the environmental field, Waste, etc.).

For each data, the following is available:

  • the brief description of the single data / dataset and thematic view
  • the metadata sheet published on the Geoportale of data supplier and / or distributor (CSW service)

with specific consultation functions such as:

  • simple consultation on the map of geographic data
  • consultation of detailed information on the datasets includes on alphanumeric and / or geographic searches on the data that return reports of the report type and single detail sheets on the objects (WFS services of complex feature type)
  • report view data - summary data - can be exported in csv format and / or ESRI shapefile
  • the details sheet is exportable in pdf format
  • all data available on the platform are exposed and / or use OGC (Open Spatial Consortium) standard interoperability services as required by the INSPIRE Directive.

CreditsPanel.text:
Credits

Sistema Conoscenze Ambientali, created by CSI Piemonte on behalf of the Piedmont Region, uses the following open source software Mapstore2 .

Copyright

Except for materials specifically and expressly indicated as otherwise protected, the contents of the site are subject to the Creative license Commons Attribution CC BY 2.5, in compliance with the regional legislation on open data ( lr 24/2011 and DGR 22-4687 of 8 October 2012 ). Images, videos, trademarks, logos, banners, newspapers, domains, and any other distinctive signs that appear on this site are the property of Piedmont Region and/or third parties and are protected under the current legislation on copyright, on patents, and those relating to intellectual property. The databases, geoservices and maps are the property of their respective owners, indicated in the metadata, and are subject to the associated licenses.

Use of the Site

Piedmont Region cannot be held responsible for damages of any nature caused directly or indirectly by accessing the Environmental Knowledge System, by the use of interactive tools, by the inability or impossibility to access it, by the off-line use of the downloaded content. Regione Piemonte reserves the right to modify the contents of the site (texts, images, datasets, geoservices, ...) and of the legal notes at any time and without notice. Although great attention is paid to the accuracy of the information published on this site, fidelity, accuracy, topicality, reliability and completeness of the contents remain responsibility of the owners indicated in the metadata. The user undertakes not to abuse the service offered and to renounce its use for illegal practices.

Assistance

Any reports can be sent to assistenza.sira@regione.piemonte.it.

Accessibility.title: Accessibility
Accessibility.body:
Accessibility

Regione Piemonte pays great attention to the accessibility of information.

See Declaration of accessibility issued by the Agency for Digital Italy (AgID) .

To report cases of non-compliance with accessibility requirements, to request information and contents that have been excluded from the scope of application of the EU Directive 2016/2102 write to sita@regione.piemonte.it

Thank you, your contribution is invaluable.
